snippet: Gina Chon agreed to resign after she admitted violating company policy by showing articles before publication to Brett McGurk, then on the National Security Council staff.
abstract: Gina Chon agreed to resign after she admitted violating company policy by showing articles before publication to Brett McGurk, then on the National Security Council staff.

headline.main: Journal Reporter Quits Over E-Mails to Iraqi Envoy Nominee
